statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Given n positive integers, is it possible to divide them into pairs so that the sum of each pair is the same?

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The input contains several test cases. The first line of each case contains a single integer n (2 ≤ n ≤ 100). The second line contains n positive integers not greater than 1000. These numbers are sorted in non-decreasing order. The last case is followed by a single zero, which should not be processed.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, output ‘Yes’ or ‘No’ depending on whether or not the pairing is possible.
